title: “白菜价”智能时代，为何95%的企业AI项目依然失败？
description: 企业面临的真正挑战不是技术壁垒，而是如何与这种新型智能体建立共生关系。

descriptionZh: 企业面临的真正挑战不是技术壁垒，而是如何与这种新型智能体建立共生关系。
descriptionEn: The real challenge enterprises face is not the technical barrier, but how to establish a symbiotic relationship with this new type of intelligent agent.

title: 对话Mistral CEO：各大车型趋同，AI公司如何赚钱？

descriptionEn: The gap between AI models is narrowing, and competition is shifting towards enterprise implementation and control.
